QuotesList:
You don't have to control your thoughts. You Just have to stop letting them control you.

- Dan Millman

Happiness can be found even in the darkest times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.

- Albus Dumbeldore

Vulnerability sounds like truth and feels like courage. Truth and Courage aren't always comfortable but they are never weaknesses.

- Brene Brown

There is always hope even when your brain tells you there isn't.

-John Green

Nothing can dim the light that shines from within.

-Maya Angelou

Feelings come and go like clouds in the a windy sky. Concious breathing is my anchor.

- Thich Nhat Hanh

FeedbackList.sleep: Having enough rest is vital and ensures better physical and mental well-being.
FeedbackList.water: It is advisable to increase water intake, and it is beneficial for physical well-being.
FeedbackList.screen: Allowing yourself respite from electronic devices aids in cultivating a healthier balance. It is advisable for you to take a periodic break.
stress: Please remember it is important to take care of yourself by enjoying a long walk or treating yourself to a snack. Self-care and recharging one's batteries are very important.
When under pressure, it's crucial to work smarter than harder. Finding out the optimal time for starting a task and stopping it can be challenging.
Please remember to engage with close friends and families during periods of stress. It can aid in bringing peace to one's mind.
Listening to music that one can relate to can release and alleviate tension.
